io

Class IOHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.IOHandler

  • public class IOHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Central class handling I/O-Operations
    Author:
    Nelphindal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IOHandler(StartupContainer sc, java.lang.String iconFile)
      Creates a new IO-Handler
      IOHandler(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new temporarily IOHandler to present a GUI as fast as possible

        Creates a new IO-Handler
        Parameters:
        sc - the object container containing all necessary startup information
        iconFile - the name of the icon within the jar-archive or the path relative to the workingDirectory

      • IOHandler

        public IOHandler(java.lang.String name)
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a new temporarily IOHandler to present a GUI as fast as possible
        Parameters:
        name - title to be shown with the GUI
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
